channel.title: Mopman should be banned
channel.description:
Hasn't even seen Star Wars! I mean what kind of self respecting nerd hasn't even tried to watch it? Complete disgrace.
Also, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FxKtZmQgxrI

item.title: Mopman should be banned
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:20, topic:326798”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=423204.msg3107986#msg3107986 date=1264311804]
You have to admit though, the pod racing concept made for some awesome video games!
[/quote]
That’s only redeeming quality of episode 1, Pod Racer for the N64 is awesome[/quote]
Pretty sure I had that game. I definitely played a Star Wars pod racing game back in the day, so that’s probably it.

Also, yeah, bits and pieces of The Phantom Menace were boring – but the final lightsabre duel between Obi Wan, Qui Gon and Darth Maul was awesome (as was the associated music, Duel of the Fates).

Read full topic

item.title: Mopman should be banned
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:17, topic:326798”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=423204.msg3107700#msg3107700 date=1264289884]

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=423204.msg3107665#msg3107665 date=1264287713]

srt8 hadn’t watched Star Wars before I made her watch them, she still hasn’t seen the last one yet (the latest one made, we watched them in release order), but even she liked them.

Come on mopman, you gotta watch them!
[/quote]why would you let her watch episodes 1-3
[/quote]ya, they are bad

not that bad, though the first one was boring as fk with the pod racing etc[/quote]

You have to admit though, the pod racing concept made for some awesome video games!
